items.title: The phone is dead. Long live . . . what exactly?
items.description: "We're not going to be using iPhones in 10 years," Callaghan says flatly. "I kind of don't think we'll be using them in five years."

items.title: The best AI-powered dictation apps of 2025

items.title: VCs predict enterprises will spend more on AI in 2026 — through fewer vendors
items.description: Enterprises have been experimenting with AI tools for a few years. Investors predict they will start to pick winners in 2026.
